name: benching-dec-2016
description: A simple homogenous component boot perf test

scripts.build: npm run clean-dist && npm run make-dist && npm run build-shared && npm run build-demos
scripts.build-demos: npm run build-vanilla && npm run build-preact && npm run build-react && npm run build-vue && npm run build-custom-elements && npm run build-ember2
scripts.build-preact: npm run make-preact && cp src/preact/ssr.html dist/preact && cp src/preact/no-ssr.html dist/preact && rollup -c src/preact/rollup.config.js
scripts.build-react: npm run make-react && cp src/react/ssr.html dist/react && cp src/react/no-ssr.html dist/react && rollup -c src/react/rollup.config.js
scripts.build-vue: npm run make-vue && cp -R src/vue dist && rollup -c src/vue/rollup.config.js
scripts.build-custom-elements: npm run make-custom-elements && cp -R src/custom-elements dist
scripts.build-ember2: npm run make-ember2 && cd src/third_party/ember2 && ember build --env production && cd .. && cd .. && cd .. && cp -R src/third_party/ember2/dist/ dist/ember2

author: Paul Lewis
